options.cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT unique_seller FOR (s:Seller) REQUIRE s.id IS NODE KEY
CREATE CONSTRAINT unique_customer FOR (c:Customer) REQUIRE c.id IS NODE KEY
CREATE CONSTRAINT unique_sold_product FOR ()-[s:SOLD]->() REQUIRE s.productId IS RELATIONSHIP KEY

custom_query.name: (:Customer)<-[:SOLD]-(:Seller) Nodes
custom_query.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (seller:Seller {id: row.seller_id}) MERGE (customer:Customer {id: row.customer_id}) MERGE (seller)-[:SOLD {productId: row.product_id}]->(customer)
